data.text:
Americans have access to Medicaid, food stamps, housing subsidies, and dozens of other federal benefits—but Washington doesn’t consider any of this income when it claims that 11% of Americans live in poverty.

When we count these benefits, the real poverty rate is less than 1%. https://t.co/jdgyDyNExf

Anna St. John is a real student of the law. 

She’s exactly the kind of person we need on the federal bench—and I know she’ll do an incredible job for the Eastern District of Louisiana. https://t.co/FYsKZ86XtF

Louisiana dealt with a tough ice storm, and many folks—especially in the north and central parts of our state—are picking up the pieces.

I talked to @SecScottBessent today about getting our people the tax extensions they need. https://t.co/j57xQOloNE

It was weapons-grade stupid to defund the police in 2020. It is just as dumb to defund ICE today.

My latest in @FoxNewsOpinion:

https://t.co/WSmsCx5BOr

For years, Iran has exported terrorism. It can’t do that anymore.

Why?

Because the United States and Israel have given Iran and its friends a CURB-STOMPING. https://t.co/3fspDQs6Vu

When moms and dads lie down to sleep at night and can’t, they’re not thinking about whether a man can breastfeed.

They’re worried about the cost of living.

Republicans have brought inflation down, but there’s more work to do and Americans know it. @JacquiHeinrich https://t.co/oveGLGCaex

There are people out there who mean our ICE agents and their family members harm.

It would be dangerous to leave our law enforcement officers’ identities unprotected. https://t.co/hJt3VgEAEj

Prime Minister Starmer, please don’t give away the Chagos Islands—where we share a joint MILITARY BASE.

I’ve got rocks in my driveway that are smarter than that idea. https://t.co/TyRgQ1ehkH

Prime Minister Starmer, please do the right thing.

If you insist on giving away the Chagos Islands, don’t give them to Mauritius. That only helps China.

Sell them to America.

I’ll sponsor a bill to ensure the U.S. keeps one of the world’s most important military bases. https://t.co/rSeSyJnjmS

If your bank’s history involves aiding the Nazis by hiding illicit assets and helping crooks dodge taxes, maybe you’re not smarter and more virtuous than the Americans you’re trying to de-bank over their political views. https://t.co/U0bVwLTuLh
